questions.question: If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
What is your preferred method of causing chaos and mayhem?
options: Elemental powers (e.g., controlling fire, water, etc.)

questions.question: Which of the following evil lairs suits your style best?
options: Abandoned castle in a haunted forest
High-tech skyscraper in a bustling city

questions.question: Do you strive for world domination
options: No, I'm focusing on my local market

questions.question: Can we send you some information about Super Villain Society?
